workflow.name: Palo Alto - Panorama - Create Address Object
workflow.title: Palo Alto - Panorama - Create Address Object

properties.name: Device Group Name
properties.description: The name of the device group to create address groups for. This is only required when Location is set to device-group

properties.name: Object Name
properties.description: A name for the new address object

properties.name: Address Value
properties.description:
The address to add to the new object. This must be the correct format for the Address Type provided.
- ip-netmask:
    an IPv4 or IPv6 address or a network using the
    slash notation (Ex. 192.168.80.150 or 92.168.80.0/24);
-  ip-range:
    an IPv4 or IPv6 address range (Ex. 10.0.0.1-10.0.0.4);
- ip-wildcard:
    an IP wildcard mask (Ex. 10.20.1.0/0.0.248.255);
- fqdn:
    fully qualified domain name, up to 255 characters.
See: https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/pan-os/8-1/pan-os-web-interface-help/objects/objects-addresses.html#Type

properties.name: Location
properties.description: The availability of the adress group. Valid values include: shared, device-group. If using device-group, you must provide a Device Group Name

properties.name: Object Description
properties.description: A description for the new address object (up to 1023 characters)

properties.name: API Key
properties.description: Your API key for the Panorama REST API. See: https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/pan-os/10-0/pan-os-panorama-api/get-started-with-the-pan-os-xml-api/get-your-api-key.html

properties.name: Address Type
properties.description:
The type of object to create. Valid values include:
- ip-netmask
- ip-range
- ip-wildcard
- fqdn
See: https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/pan-os/8-1/pan-os-web-interface-help/objects/objects-addresses.html#Type

Creates an address object in Palo Alto Panorama.

Note: You may need to use a SecureX Orchestration Remote to communicate with Panorama if it's on-premise. See: https://cs.co/SXO_remote

Target: HTTP Endpoint for your Panorama instance with a path of "/restapi/"

Account Key: None (uses an API key)

Steps:
[] Build the address object JSON
[] Request the object be created
[] Check if the request was successful:
[]> If it wasn't, output an error

More information about this API: https://<your Panorama>/restapi-doc/#tag/objects-addresses/paths/~1restapi~1v10.0~1Objects~1Addresses/post
properties.display_name: Palo Alto - Panorama - Create Address Object

properties.result_message:
Failed to create the address object
